admiral-trench.author: Fantasy Flight Games
admiral-trench.name: Admiral Trench
admiral-trench.ability: At the start of each Ship Phase, you may reveal and discard 1 command dial from this card. If you do, until the end of the round, when a friendly ship spends only a matching command token to resolve a command, that ship resolves that command as if it had spent a dial and token of the same type instead.
